circumstances:
The float plane crashed in unknown circumstances in the Johor River shortly after takeoff from Singapore-Seletar. A crew member was killed and five others were injured. 
Crew:
P/O Robert Douglas Blair, †
S/Ldr Albert Wentworth Bates,
LAC William Trevor Davies,
AC1 Joe Lee,
AC1 Leonard Frank Wilkins,
AC1 Alexander Thomas Edward Daniells.
